span.span: Represents an immutable list, which is a strongly typed list of objects that can be accessed by index.

summary.span: **NuGet package**: System.Collections.Immutable（关于不可变集合和安装方法）

span.span: **NuGet package**: System.Collections.Immutable (about immutable collections and how to install)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当添加或从一个不可变列表中删除项时，项添加或删除，与创建的原始列表的副本，并且原始列表保持不变。When you add or remove items from an immutable list, a copy of the original list is made with the items added or removed, and the original list is unchanged.

span.span: This type is thread safe.

summary.span: 返回一个循环访问不可变列表的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the immutable list.

returns.span: 可用于循环访问不可变列表的枚举器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 此枚举器用作值类型 （即，当它不装箱），不要复制它将其分配给第二个变量或将其传递到另一种方法。When this enumerator is used as a value type (that is, when it isn't boxed), do not copy it by assigning it to a second variable or by passing it to another method. 释放此枚举器，它返回到资源池，可变引用类型堆栈和值类型枚举器复制 （其可以轻松地会无意中，如果将围绕值传递），是否存在风险时，已经过的堆栈返回到资源池可能仍在使用情况的一个枚举器副本，从而导致数据损坏或异常。When this enumerator is disposed of, it returns a mutable reference type stack to a resource pool, and if the value type enumerator is copied (which can easily happen unintentionally if you pass the value around), there is a risk that a stack that has already been returned to the resource pool may still be in use by one of the enumerator copies, leading to data corruption or exceptions.
